name: Brick Birds - Drop & Pop
description:
Enjoy this wonderful and exciting game that’s full of colorful blocks and cute birds. Make sure to stack them correctly and match the same colors to get the highest score.

Challenge your friends and have them beat your high score in this wonderfull Bird Block Fall game.


This game features:
-Fun colorful bird blocks
-Easy controls
-Exciting in game sounds
-Unlimited fun
-Cute graphics
